item.name: Fetch a list of users with pagination

request.description:
Content-Type:

```
application/json

 ```

## üì¶ Sample GET Users

``` json
 {
     "id": 1,
     "email": "george.bluth@reqres.in",
     "first_name": "George",
     "last_name": "Bluth",
     "avatar": "https://reqres.in/img/faces/1-image.jpg"
  }

 ```

StartFragment

### üîç Response Field Descriptions

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `data.id` | Integer | Unique ID of the created Users |
| `data.email` | String | String Email of the Users |
| `Data.first_name` | String | String First name of the Uses |
| `data.last_name` | String | String Last name of the Uses |
| `data.avatar` | String | String Image of the Uses |

### üìò Notes

- This response is returned when fetching a User **by ID** using `GET /users/:id`.
    
- Make sure to handle `404 Not Found` if the users ID does not exist.

### ‚úÖ Usage Notes

application/json



 ```
